Topic.Title: How long does it take for a game to put it on this site?

Posts.EditableText: I have submitted my game as a CAS file. It said it would take longer. I have already waited 1 day. How long does it usually take?
Posts.HTML: I have submitted my game as a CAS file. It said it would take longer. I have already waited 1 day. How long does it usually take?

Posts.EditableText: They're all reviewed by me. To be honest I've not actually gone through the submitted games for a while... maybe I'll go through them this weekend. Basically there's no standard time to wait. If you're really nice to me I might put it up sooner
Posts.HTML:
They're all reviewed by me. To be honest I've not actually gone through the submitted games for a while... maybe I'll go through them this weekend.

Basically there's no standard time to wait. If you're really nice to me I might put it up sooner

Posts.EditableText: Thanks a lot for the info. I submited my game twice because I thought you never received it the first time. It's called the last detective. The second time I put it I made it as a zipped file so that would make it easier for you. Tell me what you think about the game and thanks a lot for your help. I really enjoy this software. My email address is catalinadrian007@aol.com

Posts.EditableText: [quote="bloodreaper":3ds17qfp]:D I posted a game 4 months ago and t still hasnt been put up on the archive. So much for good service.[/quote:3ds17qfp] How big was your game? Had you tested it for errors before you sent it off? Did you run the text through a spell check? Was it a proper game or just a five minute demo that you threw together when you were bored?
